name: Whispering Trees Ritual

visual_sequence.description: User approaches a sacred tree. Prompts appear: 'Place your hand on the bark. Feel it remember.'
Wind picks up as user hears their own voice whispering back. Textbox: 'Tell the wind what you've hidden.'
User sees stars reflected in water. Prompt: 'Speak what you cannot say aloud. Watch it ripple away.'
Crows gather on fenceposts. One caws. Prompt: 'Tell them what must be carried away for you.'

options.text: Release into the roots. You are done here.
Let them carry it skyward. You are not done, but you are not alone.

audio_layers.ambient: whispers + forest wind + soft crow calls

notes: All visuals confirmed and linked to ritual branches. No additional assets needed unless optional audio becomes immersive. Ready for user testing or final audio embedding.
